features.all-in-one: O ALL-IN-ONE inclui todos os outros recursos e faz uma m√©dia geral. Essa m√©dia geral √© a m√©dia das m√©dias de Correspond√™ncia de cores, Amizades, Men√ß√µes, Fontes comuns e Amigos comuns. Esse recurso avalia seus #affinitwees da maneira mais precisa poss√≠vel.

features.affinitweet-global-rank: Affinitwees Global Rank √© baseado no recurso ALL-IN-ONE. Ele determina a classifica√ß√£o dos #affinitwees de um resultado existente em rela√ß√£o a todos os outros resultados. Seus #affinitwees s√£o mais altos que a m√©dia?
features.color-matching: Color Matching √© um novo recurso que calcula a porcentagem de semelhan√ßa entre as cores do seu perfil do Twitter e as de outro usu√°rio. √â baseado na cor do plano de fundo e do tema, que est√£o dispon√≠veis em twitter.com/settings/design na parte inferior da p√°gina.

legal.intro: De acordo com o artigo 6 da lei n¬∞ 2004-575 de 21 de junho de 2004, sobre Confian√ßa na Economia Digital, os usu√°rios do site {site} s√£o informados sobre a identidade das v√°rias partes envolvidas em sua implementa√ß√£o e monitoramento:
legal.creator: Criador
legal.publisherText: O respons√°vel pela publica√ß√£o √© uma pessoa f√≠sica.
legal.requestAddress: Endere√ßo completo dispon√≠vel mediante solicita√ß√£o por e-mail para {email}.
legal.p1: Um cookie √© um pequeno arquivo de texto enviado para o seu navegador atrav√©s do site que voc√™ est√° visualizando. Com este cookie, as informa√ß√µes sobre sua visita s√£o armazenadas no site, como seu idioma preferido e outras configura√ß√µes. Isso pode facilitar sua pr√≥xima visita a este site e torn√°-lo mais √∫til para voc√™. Os cookies desempenham um papel importante. Sem cookies, o uso da Web poderia ser muito mais frustrante.
legal.p2: Ao alterar o artigo 5.¬∫, n.¬∫ 3, da Diretiva 2002/58/CE, atrav√©s da ado√ß√£o da Diretiva 2009/136/CE, o legislador europeu estabeleceu o princ√≠pio de que o armazenamento de informa√ß√µes no equipamento de um utilizador ou o acesso √† informa√ß√µes j√° armazenadas s√≥ devem ser realizadas com o consentimento pr√©vio do usu√°rio, a menos que essas a√ß√µes sejam estritamente necess√°rias para que o provedor entregue um servi√ßo expressamente solicitado pelo usu√°rio. O artigo 32-II da lei de 6 de janeiro de 1978 inclui este princ√≠pio.
legal.t2: Este site usa cookies para os seguintes fins:
legal.l1-1: Para nos ajudar a reconhecer seu navegador e salvar as prefer√™ncias que voc√™ definiu nas suas visitas anteriores a este site;
legal.l1-2: Para nos ajudar a medir e estudar a efic√°cia do nosso conte√∫do interativo on-line, recursos, publicidade e outras comunica√ß√µes;
legal.l1-3: Para monitorar os dados anal√≠ticos do site, o uso feito do site pelos usu√°rios e para melhorar os servi√ßos e conte√∫do deste site.
legal.t3: Como fa√ßo para excluir os cookies ligados ao meu navegador?
legal.p3: Voc√™ pode optar por desativar os cookies em seu navegador a qualquer momento, seguindo as instru√ß√µes fornecidas nos arquivos de ajuda do seu navegador. Voc√™ tamb√©m pode configurar seus cookies diretamente nas configura√ß√µes do seu navegador:

privacy.intro: Levamos a privacidade dos dados muito a s√©rio e, no decorrer de nossos neg√≥cios, queremos informar nossos usu√°rios sobre o que fazemos com eles. Voc√™ encontrar√° abaixo todas as informa√ß√µes necess√°rias sobre o armazenamento e processamento desses dados. Informa√ß√µes sobre cookies tamb√©m est√£o dispon√≠veis {thatPage}.
privacy.p1: Quando voc√™ faz login no Affinitweet, n√≥s coletamos as informa√ß√µes do seu perfil do Twitter que precisamos para oferecer nossos servi√ßos. Entre essas informa√ß√µes, armazenamos seu:
privacy.p2: As outras informa√ß√µes que voc√™ pode ver no seu perfil s√£o armazenadas temporariamente em sua sess√£o, apenas fa√ßa o logout para apag√°-las.
privacy.i1: Informa√ß√£o: esses dados podem ser exclu√≠dos integralmente e imediatamente clicando em {button} na parte inferior de {yourProfile}.
privacy.p3: Por padr√£o, o Affinitweet n√£o armazena os resultados do que voc√™ faz. No entanto, voc√™ pode ativar essa op√ß√£o para ter um hist√≥rico dos seus resultados no seu perfil. Entre essas informa√ß√µes, n√≥s armazenamos:
privacy.l2-1: o usu√°rio a quem o resultado pertence
privacy.i2: Informa√ß√£o: esses dados podem ser exclu√≠dos integralmente e imediatamente clicando em {button} na parte inferior de {yourProfile}.
privacy.p4: Quando voc√™ executa as v√°rias funcionalidades presentes no site, fazemos chamadas para a API do Twitter com seus tokens armazenados anteriormente.
privacy.i3: Informa√ß√£o: usamos seus tokens para poder ser o mais preciso poss√≠vel em nossos resultados. Assim, se voc√™ seguir um ou mais usu√°rios com uma conta protegida, por exemplo, poderemos inclu√≠-los nos resultados, se necess√°rio.
privacy.p5: Aqui est√° o que podemos ter que recuperar:
privacy.p6: Esta informa√ß√£o √© apenas coletada e processada, n√≥s n√£o a armazenamos.
privacy.p7: Quando voc√™ faz o login no Affinitweet, pedimos acesso b√°sico de leitura √† sua conta e acesso de grava√ß√£o. N√£o tomaremos nenhuma a√ß√£o a menos que voc√™ tenha solicitado especificamente, ativando uma op√ß√£o do site.
privacy.i4: Informa√ß√£o: voc√™ pode revogar o acesso que nos deu quando se conectou a qualquer momento a partir do {yourTwitterProfile}.
privacy.p8: Para poder usar determinadas funcionalidades, podemos solicitar que voc√™ ative a op√ß√£o de tweet autom√°tico para resultados. Se voc√™ concordar em ativar esta op√ß√£o, um tweet ser√° publicado para cada resultado com a imagem gerada.
privacy.i5: Informa√ß√£o: voc√™ pode desativar essa op√ß√£o a qualquer momento em {yourProfile} na se√ß√£o {button}.
privacy.question: Alguma d√∫vida?
privacy.p9: Se voc√™ tiver alguma d√∫vida sobre Affinitweet, por favor, n√£o hesite em nos contatar via Twitter ou e-mail, teremos o maior prazer em lhe responder!

termsofservice.p1: Ao acessar o site em {url}, voc√™ concorda em cumprir estes termos de servi√ßo, todas as leis e regulamenta√ß√µes aplic√°veis e concorda que √© respons√°vel pela conformidade com as leis locais aplic√°veis. Se voc√™ n√£o concorda com algum destes termos, voc√™ est√° proibido de usar ou acessar este site. Os materiais contidos neste site s√£o protegidos pela lei aplic√°vel de direitos autorais e marcas registradas.
termsofservice.l1-1: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Affinitweet's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

termsofservice.l2-4: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or

termsofservice.l1-2: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Affinitweet at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.
termsofservice.l3-1: The materials on Affinitweet's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Affinitweet makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
termsofservice.l3-2: Further, Affinitweet does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.
termsofservice.p2: In no event shall Affinitweet or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Affinitweet's website, even if Affinitweet or a Affinitweet authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.
termsofservice.p3: The materials appearing on Affinitweet's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Affinitweet does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current. Affinitweet may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. However Affinitweet does not make any commitment to update the materials.
termsofservice.p4: Affinitweet has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Affinitweet of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.

new.title: Welcome to the new version of Affinitweet
new.p1: 3 years after our launch and a great success flooding the TL of our haters (but especially with our users ‚ù§Ô∏è), Affinitweet is getting a new look but not only on the visual, everything has been redone... from scratch!
new.p2: We decided to make Affinitweet more serious and professional. Indeed, we want to become THE reference hub for everything you can do from Twitter, nothing but that!
new.p3: And to achieve this, we have set ourselves no limits and have given our best for this new version. In detail, here's what you can expect...
new.p4: After having used the Twitter logo for a long time, we decided to create a real identity. And it's done. As you can see, Affinitweet now has its own logo with its own colours. A nice gradient that can be found all over the site with shades of white and grey variations.
new.p5: The icons of the functionalities have also been reworked, the generated images are of better quality and more advanced. The categories have been renamed and their content revised.
new.p6: Always looking for maximum quality, the site is "pixel-perfect". If this is not the case for you, please let us know and we will deal with it as soon as possible!
new.p7: We have based this new version on the latest web technologies. The result: a huge gain in speed that is felt by simply browsing the site or even waiting for the results of the requested functionalities!
new.p8: Coupled with this, you will be able to see the progress of your results in real time, which will pass the time even faster!
new.p9: We have also developed much more rigorously, so there will be far fewer bugs not to say "none" because we are never safe from a clever little well hidden!
new.p10: Finally! During these 3 years we have been collecting statistics about our users and it turns out that you are mostly connecting to Affinitweet from your phones. But we suspected that a little bit, because since the time we were asked for it...
new.p11: The site is now completely responsive, i. e. it adapts to all screen sizes and displays correctly even for the smallest phones üòâ
new.p12: We have focused on the management of personal data, you now have complete control over it directly and all options are disabled by default. You will find all the necessary information about how we store and use them on the {button} page.
new.p13: When you go to your profile page, you should see something more accomplished among these options:
new.l1-1: manage the automatic tweet when results are returned
new.l1-2: save the results in your Affinitweet history
new.l1-4: change the interface language among those proposed
new.l1-5: clean up your Affinitweet results history
new.l1-6: delete your account and all associated data
new.p14: Don't hesitate to help us internationalize the platform by translating texts from the space provided on {button}. We will credit you just below the language in which you translated Affinitweet to show our gratitude and thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è
new.p15: We will continue to improve Affinitweet with new features as we have been able to do until now.
new.p16: Many thanks to you for having been with us for so many years, hoping that this new version will please you! Do not hesitate to tell us your opinion about this one on Twitter by mentioning @affinitweet_ üòÑ

faq.title: Frequenlty asked questions
faq.intro: Welcome on our frequently asked questions page! If you don't find your answers, contact us! Click on the right category corresponding to your search or search terms in the input field below.

global: What is Affinitweet's purpose?

This is a very often asked question, Affinitweet brings two things: entertaining features and statistics, separated into two distinct categories. You certainly know Affinitweet for its viral and entertaining features shared on Twitter, but we offer other useful and interesting features!
How to use our services / login?
To use our services, you must log in with your Twitter account. To do so, simply click on "Log in" at the top right, then go to the page of your choice.
How do I access my profile or log out?
Once logged in with your Twitter account, you can access your profile or log out by clicking or hovering your Twitter nickname at the top right.
But Affinitweet is French?
Absolutely, Affinitweet was created and is hosted in France üá´üá∑, do not be surprised if we speak better french than english or if we answer you on Twitter more easily in this language!
Affinitweet is not available in my language, how do I do?

If your language is not supported, you will see Affinitweet in english by default. If you have the courage and desire to help us internationalize and appear as a translator on Affinitweet, you can participate and translate the texts available here.
Why is there a mining script?

When we released our new version, it included a mining script on all pages, inactive by default, now included only when the option is enabled. We have taken the initiative to offer two kinds of remuneration by giving you the choice between advertising (by default) or mining. To activate it, simply switch the monetization mode in your profile to enjoy Affinitweet without ads.
Why are you asking for write access to my Twitter account?

For ease of use, we request read and write access to your Twitter account so that we can publish a tweet if you allow us to do so. This saves us having to create two applications, and you having to log in twice.
Why was a tweet published without my consent?

This is not the case and it never will be, we always obtain your consent via an action on your part before doing anything. If a tweet has been posted to your Twitter profile, you have authorized us to do so by clicking an approval button.
What do "POP" and "NEW" mean?
These labels are attached to features and are visible next to them. "POP" means "popular." It's a popular feature. "NEW" means "new". It's a feature that was added a while ago.
How do I log in with another account?

When you log in to Affinitweet, the Twitter account to which you are connected on the browser is used. If you want to switch your account and use Affinitweet with an account other than this one, you have several possibilities: (1) while connected, hover your username on the top right and click on "Switch account", you will be redirected to Twitter and asked to log in with your new account ; (2) switch to private browsing; (3) disconnect from Twitter and reconnect with the new account; (4) use another browser not connected with that same Twitter account.
features: How is the Top Friends determined?
The Top Friends is mainly determined from tweets, we go back to your last 3200 tweets to establish a ranking over a long period.
Why doesn't my Top Friends stick to reality?

We try to get as close as possible to reality with the information we collect. Sometimes someone you don't talk to anymore but have talked to a lot in the past is present in your Top Friends if you haven't been tweeting a lot for a while for example.
How are the results of the other features determined?
The algorithms used to determine these results are strictly confidential, unfortunately we do not wish to communicate on them.
I got my sister at Valentine's and my dad in Secret Crush!

"Fun" features are only intended to entertain as the category name indicates. Although we try to get as close to reality as possible with our algorithm parameters, if we come across the right person(s) it would only be by chance!
How does First To Follow work?

The First To Follow is an exclusive feature and is not available anywhere else. It lets you know when a given person has followed you and vice versa. Gourmet functionality, you can only make a limited number per 15 minutes.
The Emoji Mood lets you know which emojis you've been tweeting the most lately, we go back to your last 3200 tweets and simply count that!
security: Yes, Affinitweet is only accessible in https in order to secure your connection as much as possible. You can check our security certificates by a recognized organization like SSLLabs.
Yes, since some time we created a Trustpilot page to collect the opinion of our users, you can consult them and add one if you want.
Absolutely not, we are doing everything we can to avoid that. Affinitweet is 100% secure, we guarantee you not to catch anything like this on our site.
Where is my data and is it safe?
Your data is stored on the servers we rent in Paris. We are hosted by one of the leaders and guarantee that your data is secure.
privacy: What do you do with my data?

We explain everything we do with the data we collect and process in our Data and Privacy page. But to make it short, we recover and store the bare minimum. We will never communicate them to anyone, ever.
How do I delete my account?
Once logged in, simply go to your profile and scroll down and click the delete account button. All data relating to your account will then be immediately deleted.
monetization: It's free so I'm the product?

Yes, but no. Our source of revenue comes only from the ads displayed on the feature pages as well as the mining if you have it enabled in your profile. These revenues are used to cover the costs of servers, development and eventually pay for a few beers if there is anything left!
